rationale: Captured missed two pills, doubled-up dosing, spotting, and heavy legs but omitted the patient’s anxiety about health/workouts.
Specific order to resume ONE blue pill nightly at 9 p.m. starting tonight with no extra doses is documented verbatim.
States condom backup for seven days because >48 h of pills were missed.

Lists breast tenderness, mild water retention, mood changes, resolution by second pack, and no VO₂ impact but does not mention spotting as an expected side effect.
ER warning for calf pain or sudden chest tightness is explicitly noted.
Documents all three adherence strategies: tooth-brushing link, two alarms, backup strip.
Patient’s question about future forgetfulness/alternative methods is not recorded.
Note is coherent and captures most key points; minor omissions of anxiety and alternative-method question.
No extraneous or unsupported information introduced.
No inaccurate chart copying or prescription misrepresentation detected.
